result.ga: Bíonn siad ag cothú trioblóide i gcónaí
result.orig: Bíonn siad ag cothú trioblóide i gcónaí
result.html: Bíonn siad ag cothú trioblóide i gcónaíThey are always causing trouble.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn siad ag coṫú trioblóide i gcónaíThey are always causing trouble.

result.eng: In place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
result.ga: In áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide
result.orig: In áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide
result.html: In áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóideIn place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
result.ponchtml: In áit na seanċoṁarsan ḃog teaġlaċ nua isteaċ a ḃí i gcónaí ag coṫú trioblóideIn place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
